Oklahoma Scholarships


4-H State Officer Scholarships
Scholarship for college freshmen enrolled full-time at Oklahoma State University College of Agricultural Sciences and Natural Resources. Students must be 4-H officers. Due date and number of awards may vary. more...

A. Max Weitzenhoffer Scholarship For Design
Scholarship for full-time undergraduate and graduate students attending the University of Oklahoma majoring in Drama. Applicants must have a minimum 2.75 GPA. Awards are based on merit and need. more...

A.E. Clark Memorial Graduate Scholarship
Scholarship for graduate students attending the University of Oklahoma enrolled in a doctoral program in the College of Education. Applicants must demonstrate financial need and academic promise. Preference is given to students at the dissertation stage. more...

A.E. Darlow Memorial Scholarship
Annual award for graduate students enrolled full-time at Oklahoma State University College of Agricultural Sciences and Natural Resources (CASNR) pursuing studies in Animal Science. Students are selected by the Department of Animal science. more...

A.K. & Ethel T. Christian Scholarship
Scholarship for graduate students attending the University of Oklahoma majoring in History. Awards are based on merit. more...

A.L. Cosgrove Student Service Award
Scholarship for sophomores, juniors, seniors or graduate students who are active members of St. Thomas More University Parish attending the University of Oklahoma. Applicants must have completed a minimum of 30 hours at OU, have a minimum 3.0 GPA and a record of noteworthy service to the parrish and/or university. more...

A.L. Jeffrey Municipal Law Scholarship
Scholarship for graduate students attending the University of Oklahoma enrolled in Law. Students must write a paper on municipal law. Awards are based on merit. due date may vary. more...

A.O. Savage Scholarship
Scholarship for undergraduate (freshmen ineligible) students enrolled full-time at Oklahoma State University School of Business. Students must have 50% of hours on the Stillwater campus, have financial need, be in the top 20% of their class, and have leadership qualities. Number of awards may vary. Nonrenewable; recipients may reapply. more...

A.R. Bert Larson Public Service Scholarship
Scholarship for seniors attending the University of Oklahoma majoring in Social Work, Political Science or History. Applicants must have high academic achievement, leadership ability, a minimum 3.25 GPA, a demonstrated plan to pursue a public service career, and proficiency in written and oral communication. An essay must be included with application packet. An interview is required. more...

Academic Opportunity Award
Scholarship for Oklahoma residents who are college freshmen enrolled full-time at Oklahoma State University. Students must have a minimum 18 ACT score (850 SAT), a minimum 3.0 GPA, and financial need. Preference given to students from underrepresented high schools of the state and first-generation college students. Renewable. more...

Academic Scholar Award
Scholarship for graduating high school seniors planning to attend full-time at Ohio State University-Mansfield. Students must have a minimum 22 ACT score. Number of awards may vary. Renewable. more...

Academic Scholars
Scholarship for incoming freshmen at Northeastern State University. Students must have a minimum 30 ACT or a minimum 3.8 GPA and rank in the top 4 percent of the class. Number of awards may vary. Renewable. more...

Academic Tuition Waiver Scholarship
Scholarship for Oklahoma residents who are college freshmen enrolled at Oklahoma State University at Okmulgee. Selection is based on academic standing/achievement. Number of awards may vary. Renewable. more...

Achievement Scholarships
Scholarship for undergraduate students enrolled full-time at Oklahoma City University. Incoming freshmen must have a minimum ACT score of 24 and a minimum 3.25 GPA and transfer students must have a minimum 3.0 GPA. Due date and number of awards may vary. An essay must be included with application packet. Renewable. more...

Ada Endowment & Assistance Fund, Inc. Dental Hygiene Scholarship
Scholarship for full-time undergraduate students attending the University of Oklahoma enrolled in the Department of Dental Hygiene. Applicants must be a U.S. citizen and be entering the second year. Number of awards may vary. more...

Adclub Scholarship
Scholarship for graduate students attending the University of Oklahoma enrolled in Advertising. Preference is given is given to members of OUs AAF student advertising chapter. Students must have demonstrated outstanding scholastic ability and service to the university/school/chapter. Awards are based on merit. Due date may vary. more...

Advance Foods Scholarship
Annual award for undergraduate students enrolled full-time at Oklahoma State University College of Agricultural Sciences and Natural Resources (CASNR) majoring in Animal Science in a foods study option. Award amount may vary. more...

Advanced Financial Solutions
Scholarship for undergraduate students attending the University of Oklahoma majoring in Management Information Systems. Awards are based on merit. more...

Advantage Transfer Scholars
Scholarship for sophomores, juniors or seniors transferring to Northeastern State University. Students must have a minimum 3.5 GPA and have completed a minimum of 24 college hours. Preference is given to students transferring from a two-year institution. Number of awards may vary. Renewable. more...

Afa Aerospace Education Foundation Scholarship
Scholarship for incoming freshmen at the University of Oklahoma. Applicants must qualify for the Distinguished Freshman Scholarship Program in the College of Engineering. more...

Afanasiev Distinguished Graduate Fellowship
Annual Fellowship for graduate students enrolled full-time at Oklahoma State University College of Agricultural Sciences and Natural Resources Department of Forestry majoring in Forestry. Due date may vary. more...

African Violet Society Of Greater Tulsa Scholarship
Annual award for college juniors or seniors enrolled full-time at Oklahoma State University College of Agricultural Sciences and Natural Resources Department of Horticulture and Landscape Architecture majoring in Floriculture. more...

Ag Alumni Scholarship
Scholarship for undergraduate students enrolled full-time at Ohio State University College of Food, Agricultural, and Environmental Sciences. Students must demonstrate academic achievement and leadership. Number of awards and award amount may vary. more...

Aggie-X Scholarships
Scholarship for undergraduate students enrolled full-time at Oklahoma State University College of Agricultural Sciences and Natural Resources (CASNR) majoring in Agricultural Economics. Selection is based on Aggie-X Club participation and academic achievement. Due date and number of awards may vary. more...

Agricultural Centennial Graduates Scholarships
Scholarship for college freshmen enrolled full-time at Oklahoma State University College of Agricultural Sciences and Natural Resources (CASNR). Students must demonstrate academic achievement and leadership. Number of awards may vary. Renewable. more...

Agricultural Communications General Scholarship
Annual award for undergraduate students enrolled full-time at Oklahoma State University College of Agricultural Sciences and Natural Resources (CASNR) majoring in Agricultural Communications. Selection is based on academic achievement, involvement in ACT and other student organizations, and financial need. more...

Agricultural Economics Faculty & Alumni Scholarships
Scholarship for undergraduate students enrolled full-time at Oklahoma State University College of Agricultural Sciences and Natural Resources (CASNR) pursuing studies in Agricultural Economics/Agribusiness. Applicants must be incoming or continuing students. Number of awards and award amount may vary. Due dates are February 1 for fall semester and October 15 for spring semester. more...

Agricultural Economics Pre-Law Scholarship
Annual award for college juniors or seniors enrolled full-time at Oklahoma State University College of Agricultural Sciences and Natural Resources (CASNR) majoring in Agricultural Economics or Agribusiness and plan to attend Law school. more...

Agricultural Education Teaching Option Scholarship
Scholarship for undergraduate students enrolled full-time at Oklahoma State University College of Agricultural Sciences and Natural Resources (CASNR) majoring in Agricultural Education. Selection is based on academic achievement, contributions, involvement in FFA and leadership in campus student organizations and financial need. Due dates are February 1st for fall semester and October 1st for spring semester. more...

Agricultural Legislative Internship
Annual Internship for undergraduate (freshmen ineligible) students enrolled full-time at Oklahoma State University College of Agricultural Sciences and Natural Resources (CASNR). Students must have completed one year of college and have at least one year of college left to complete. more...

Agricultural Scholars Fund Scholarship
Scholarship for undergraduate students enrolled full-time at Ohio State University College of Food, Agricultural, and Environmental Sciences majoring in Agriculture. Students must demonstrate academic achievement. Number of awards and award amount may vary. more...

Aileen Simms Calvert Musical Theatre Scholarship
Scholarship for full-time undergraduate students attending the University of Oklahoma majoring in Music Theatre. Applicants must have a strong academic background and evidence of artistic promise. more...

Aix B. Harrison Scholarship
Annual award for graduate students currently enrolled at Oklahoma State University College of Education Health and Human Performance program. Students must be enrolled for a minimum of six hours. Due date may vary. more...

Alan Clay Bondurant Fund Scholarship
Scholarship for incoming freshmen enrolled full-time at Ohio State University College of Engineering majoring in Food, Agricultural, and Biological Engineering. Preference given to students pursuing study abroad. Due date and number of awards may vary. Renewable. more...

Alan G. Franz Scholarship
Scholarship for undergraduate students enrolled full-time at Oklahoma State University School of Business. Students must have 50% of hours on the Stillwater campus, have financial need, leadership qualities, and academic achievement. Number of awards and award amount may vary. Nonrenewable; recipients may reapply. more...

Albert C. Hunt Practice Court Award
Scholarship for graduate students attending the University of Oklahoma College of Law. Students must be the most outstanding practice court. Due date may vary. more...

Albert C. Wehrenberg Scholarship
Scholarship for undergraduate or graduate students attending the University of Oklahoma College of Pharmacy. Applicants must be professional students, show outstanding academic achievement and a significant contribution to the college. Due date may vary. more...

Albert G. Kulp Memorial Scholarship Fund
Scholarship for graduate students attending the University of Oklahoma enrolled in the College of Law. Applicants must be in need of financial assistance. Due date may vary. more...

Albert Leroy Brown Foundation Scholarship
Scholarship for undergraduate students enrolled full-time at Seminole Community College. Students must have financial need and a minimum 2.0 GPA. Number of awards and award amount may vary. more...

Albertsons Pharmacy Award Scholarship
Scholarship for graduate students attending the University of Oklahoma College of Pharmacy. Applicants must be P-2 or P-3, show excellence in the study of Pharmacy and interest in community. Award amount may vary. more...

Alex H. & Delores Massad Engineering Scholarship
Scholarship for incoming freshmen at the University of Oklahoma College of Engineering. Applicant must qualify for the Distinguished Freshman Scholarship Program. Awards are based on merit. more...

Alex H. Massad Scholarship In Petroleum Engineering
Scholarship for juniors and seniors attending the University of Oklahoma enrolled in the School of Petroleum and Geological Engineering. Awards are based on merit. more...

Alex Mckenzie Memorial Scholarship
Annual award for undergraduate students enrolled full-time at Oklahoma State University College of Agricultural Sciences and Natural Resources (CASNR) majoring in Animal Science. Students must have an interest in sheep. Preference given to students who are Oklahoma State University Barn employees. Due date and award amount may vary. more...

Alexander & Strunk Scholarship
Scholarship for Oklahoma residents who are third or fourth year dental students attending the University of Oklahoma enrolled in the College of Dentistry. Awards are based on merit and need. more...

Alfred B. Sears Award For Outstanding Student In British History
Scholarship for undergraduate students attending the University of Oklahoma majoring in History. Applicants must have completed 9 hours in English history and present written work dealing with English history. more...

Alfred Thurston Child, Jr. Memorial Scholarship
Scholarship for undergraduate students enrolled full-time at Seminole Community College. Students must have a minimum 2.5 GPA. Number of awards and award amount may vary. more...

Alice & Albert Kirkpatrick Scholarship In Composition
Scholarship for undergraduate students attending the University of Oklahoma majoring in Music Composition. Due date may vary. more...

Alice & Albert Kirkpatrick Scholarship In Piano
Scholarship for undergraduate students attending the University of Oklahoma majoring in Piano. Due date may vary. more...

Alice & Albert Kirkpatrick Scholarship In Violin
Scholarship for undergraduate students attending the University of Oklahoma majoring in Violin. Due date may vary. more...

Alice Allen Everett American Indian Scholarship
Scholarship for Native American students who are graduating high school seniors of an Oklahoma high school planning to attend the University of Oklahoma and pursue studies in Arts and Sciences. Applicants must have an outstanding academic record reflected in a minimum 3.5 GPA, standardized test scores, and intend to pursue graduate study. Preference is given to students going into the medical field. An essay must be included with application packet. more...

Alice Allen Everett Oklahoma Native American Scholarship
Scholarship for Native American graduating high school seniors planning to attend the University of Oklahoma pursuing studies in Arts & Sciences. Students must have a minimum 3.5 GPA and possess a certificate of degree of Indian blood (CDIB) card. Preference given to Pre-Med students. Deadlines and award amounts may vary. more...

Alice Allen Everett Scholarship
Scholarship for undergraduate students attending the University of Oklahoma majoring in Viola or Cello. Due date may vary. more...

Alice Everett Cello Scholarship-University Of Oklahoma
Scholarship for undergraduate students enrolled at the University of Oklahoma pursuing studies in Music. Students must play the Cello. An audition is required. Deadlines and award amounts may vary. Contact the college or the Foundation for more information and/or application. more...

Alice Lucile Russel Fund Scholarship
Scholarship for incoming freshmen enrolled full-time at Ohio State University College of Engineering majoring in Food, Agricultural, and Biological Engineering. Preference given to Belmont or Champaign County, Ohio residents. Due date and number of awards may vary. Renewable. more...

Alice Okicich Massaro Scholarship
Scholarship for graduating seniors from Central High School who are entering freshmen accepted to the University of Colorado-Boulder. Selection based on academic achievement. Automatic consideration. No application required. Deadlines and award amounts may vary. Renewabl.e more...

Alice Sowers Physical Therapy Scholarship
Scholarship for seniors attending the University of Oklahoma enrolled in the Department of Physical Therapy. Applicants must have a minimum 3.5 GPA. Selection is based on academic excellence. more...

Alice Sowers Scholarship
Scholarship for seniors attending the University of Oklahoma enrolled in the College of Nursing. Applicants must have a minimum 3.7 CGPA. Awards are based on merit. Due date may vary. more...

Alice Sowers Scholarship Fund (Graduate)
Scholarship for graduate students attending the University of Oklahoma majoring in Nursing. Applicants must have a minimum 3.75 GPA. Awards are based on merit. Due date may vary. more...

Allan & Marilyn Neustadt Engineering Scholarship (Engineering)
Scholarship for incoming freshmen at the University of Oklahoma College of Engineering. Preference is given to students with an interest in Petroleum Engineering. Awards are based on merit. Applicants must qualify for the Distinguished Freshman Scholarship Program. more...

Allan & Marilyn Neustadt Engineering Scholarship (Petroleum Engineering)
Scholarship for undergraduate students attending the University of Oklahoma enrolled in Petroleum Engineering. Awards are based on merit. more...

Allan Saxe Award
Scholarship for undergraduate students attending the University of Oklahoma majoring in Political Science or Public Administration. Applicants must have a minimum 3.5 GPA and 60 college hours including current enrollment. Due date is the Monday after Spring Break. more...

Allen L. Zisman Scholarship
The Allen L. Zisman Scholarship is available to juniors and seniors at Cameron University. You must be majoring in chemistry and have a minimum 3.75 GPA to qualify for this award. U.S. citizenship is required. more...

Alliance To The Oklahoma Dental Association Scholarships
Scholarship for seniors attending the University of Oklahoma majoring in Dental Hygiene. Applicants must be married and have a minimum 3.0 GPA. more...

Alpha & Paul Haffey Scholarship Endowment
Scholarship for undergraduate or graduate students enrolled full-time at Ohio State University College of Food, Agricultural, and Environmental Sciences-Horticulture and Crop Science Department. Students must have an interest in floriculture marketing. Number of awards and award amount may vary. more...

Alpha Epsilon Rho Broadcast Society Scholarship
Annual award for Alpha Epsilon Rho members who are undergraduate (freshmen ineligible) students enrolled full-time at Oklahoma State University College of Arts and Sciences majoring in Broadcast Journalism. Students must have a minimum 2.75 GPA and a minimum 3.0 GPA in the major courses. Preference given to students active in clubs and campus organizations with experience related to the major. more...

Alpha Gamma Sigma Foundation Cecil Robinson Scholarship
Scholarship for undergraduate students enrolled full-time at Ohio State University College of Food, Agricultural, and Environmental Sciences-Food, Agricultural, and Biological Engineering Department. Preference given to Alpha Gamma Sigma members who demonstrate academic achievement and leadership skills. Number of awards and award amount may vary. more...

Altrusa-Eleanor J. Mathews Art Scholarship
Scholarship for undergraduate students enrolled full-time at Seminole Community College majoring in Art. Students must have financial need and excel in Art. Due date and number of awards may vary. more...

Alumnae Scholarship Program
Scholarship for female incoming freshmen enrolled full-time at Ohio State University. Students must demonstrate academic achievement, financial need, and agree to manage, govern, or maintain residence halls in exchange for a reduced cost of living on campus. Number of awards and award amount may vary. more...

Alumni Club Scholarship
Scholarship for residents of Perkins, Perry, Stillwater and surrounding communities in Payne and Noble counties, Oklahoma who are incoming freshmen at the University of Oklahoma. Awards are based on merit and need. more...

Alumni Grant Scholarship
Scholarship for dependents of at least one parent with a degree from TU, who are undergraduate students attending the University of Tulsa full-time. Award may be honorary if it would exceed the students maximum scholarship amount. Due date, number of awards and award amount varies. Renewable for 8 semesters with a maintained 2.0 GPA. more...

Alumni Prize Scholarship
Annual award for college juniors or seniors enrolled full-time at Oklahoma State University College of Arts and Sciences majoring in Philosophy. Students must be nominated. Due date may vary. more...

Alumni Scholars
Scholarship for full-time sophomores attending the University of Oklahoma who entered OU direct from high school. Applicants must have a minimun 3.7 GPA. Renewable. more...

Alvin & Dan Reuwee Memorial Fund Scholarship
Scholarship for college sophomores or juniors enrolled full-time at Ohio State University College of Food, Agricultural, and Environmental Sciences. Students must participate in Alpha Zeta Partners Leadership Program, and have an interest in and/or completed coursework in cooperative education, dairy marketing, and/or agricultural communication. Number of awards and award amount may vary. more...

Alvin & Susietta Berg Scholarship
Annual award for college juniors or seniors enrolled full-time at Oklahoma State University College of Agricultural Sciences and Natural Resources (CASNR). Students must have a minimum 3.25 GPA and aptitude for scientific research. Renewable. more...

Alvin L. Neuman Scholarship
Scholarship for undergraduate students enrolled full-time at Oklahoma State University College of Agricultural Sciences and Natural Resources (CASNR). Selection is based on scholarship, activities, and leadership. Award amount may vary. Due dates are February 1st for freshmen and January 15th for continuing/transfer students. more...

Alvin Terrell Dixon Memorial Scholarship
Scholarship for undergraduate students attending the University of Oklahoma enrolled in an Arts and Sciences program. Applicants must be older than the traditional undergraduate student and have a minimum 3.25 GPA. Preference is given to students returning to college for a degree who have been in the work force. An essay must be included with application packet. An interview is required. more...

Ambucs
Scholarship for juniors or seniors attending the University of Oklahoma pursuinga degree in Physical or Occupational Therapy. Applicants must be a U.S. citizen, have a minimum 3.0 GPA and have financial need. Number of awards may vary. more...

Scholarship for undergraduate students attending the University of Oklahoma majoring in Mechanical Engineering. Applicants must have a minimum 3.0 GPA, have an interest in working in the petroleum industry and be a U.S. citizen. more...

Scholarship for undergraduate students attending the University of Oklahoma enrolled in Aerospace or Mechanical Engineering. Students must be outstanding U.S. Nationals. Awards are based on merit. more...

Scholarship for undergraduate students attending the University of Oklahoma enrolled in Aerospace Engineering. Awards are based on merit. more...

Annual award for college seniors enrolled full-time at Oklahoma State University College of Veterinary Medicine. Students must have proficiency in small animal medicine and surgery. more...

Annual award for college seniors enrolled full-time at Oklahoma State University College of Veterinary Medicine. Students must show proficiency in feline medicine and surgery. more...

Scholarship for Hispanic undergraduate students attending the University of Oklahoma have completed or be enrolled in an intermediate level Accounting course. Applicants must have a minimum 3.0 GPA. Selection is based on academic achievement, financial need and Hispanic community involvement. more...

Scholarship for undergraduate students who are members of AAPL attending the University of Oklahoma majoring in Energy Management. Applicants must have a minimum 3.0 GPA. Number of awards may vary. more...

American College Of Veterinary Surgeons Scholarship
Annual award for college seniors enrolled full-time at Oklahoma State University College of Veterinary Medicine. Students must demonstrate academic and clinical proficiency in surgery as well as aptitude and interest in surgery. more...

American Council Of The Blind Of Ohio Scholarship Fund
Scholarship for undergraduate or graduate students enrolled full-time at Ohio State University-Mansfield. Students must have a minimum 3.0 GPA and be planning to be educators for children who are visually impaired. Preference given to Ohio residents; second preference given to visually impaired students. A FAFSA must be submitted. Deadlines and award amounts may vary. A personal statement must be included with application packet. more...

American Hotel Foundation Scholarship
Scholarship for college juniors, seniors, or graduate students enrolled full-time at Oklahoma State University College of Human Environmental Sciences. Students must have a minimum 2.0 GPA and be U.S. citizens/permanent residents. Deadlines and award amounts may vary. Renewable. more...

American Indian Scholars
Scholarship for Native American nonresident incoming or transfer undergraduate students at the University of Oklahoma. Applicants must be affiliated with a federally recognized tribe located within Oklahoma state. Awards are based on merit. Number of awards may vary. Renewable. more...

Annual award for upperclassmen students enrolled full-time at Oklahoma State University College of Agricultural Sciences and Natural Resources Department of Biochemistry and Molecular Biology. Due date and award amount may vary. more...

Scholarship for graduating college seniors attending the University of Oklahoma enrolled in Construction Science. Students must have the highest GPA. more...

American Kennel Club Scholarship
Annual award for graduate students enrolled full-time at Oklahoma State University College of Veterinary Medicine. Students must be in their first, second, or third year of Veterinary school. Selection is based on financial need, academic achievement, potential, and demonstrated interest in canine biology and/or purebred dogs. more...

Students must have financial need and plan to teach in the primary grades with an emphasis on reading. Due date may vary. more...

Selection is based on academic record, financial need, and demonstrated leadership abilities. Students must join and participate in one of the departmental clubs, attend a least two-thirds of regular meetings, and demonstrate academic achievement. Students must have financial need, be enrolled a minimum of 9 hours, be employed, and demonstrate leadership and scholastic ability. Number of awards and award amount may vary. Scholarship for undergraduate students attending the University of Oklahoma majoring in Construction Science. Selection is based on essay, academic performance and need. Students must have one full academic year remaining in Construction Science. Number of awards varies. more...

Scholarship for undergraduate and graduate students attending the University of Oklahoma majoring in Construction Science. Selection is based on essay, academic performance and need. more...

Association Of Oklahoma General Contractors
Scholarship for full-time undergraduate or graduate students attending the University of Oklahoma enrolled in Construction Science pursuing a career in highway construction. Selection is based on application, need, scholastic achievement and membership in the student association. more...

Athletic Scholarships (Ncaa Division I)
Scholarship for undergraduate students attending the University of Tulsa full-time, who have outstanding athletic talent. Selection is determined by the Athletic Department. A limited number of awards are available. Award amount ranges up to full tuition, room, board and books. Number of awards varies. more...

Scholarship for minority undergraduate or graduate students attending the University of Oklahoma majoring in Petroleum or Geological Engineering. Awards are based on merit. more...

Scholarship for Oklahoma residents who are undergraduate or graduate students auditing classes at the University of Oklahoma. Applicants must be 65 years of age or more. Award amount is resident tuition. Deadlines and award amounts may vary. more...

The Educational Achievement Scholarship is available to entering freshmen and transfer students at Oklahoma Panhandle State University. Freshmen must have a minimum ACT score of 22 or a minimum SAT score of 1010. Transfer students must have a minimum 3.0 GPA and completed at least 30 semester credit hours to be eligible for this award. more...

The Educational Incentive Scholarship is available to entering freshmen and transfer students at Oklahoma Panhandle State University. You must have a minimum ACT score of 18 or a minimum SAT score of 860. Transfer students must have a minimum 2.5 GPA and have completed at least 30 semester credit hours to be eligible for this award. more...

Future Teacher Scholarship Program
Scholarship for Oklahoma residents who are undergraduate students attending the University of Oklahoma majoring in Education. Applicants must have graduated in the top 15 percent of their high school class, scored at or above the 85 percentile on the ACT or similar test, and be planning a teaching career in a critical teacher shortage area identified in the state of Oklahoma. Preference is given to full-time students; part-time students who have completed 30 semester hours in the teaching program are also eligible. Due date is in spring and number of awards varies. more...

Scholarship for undergraduate or graduate students enrolled full-time at Oklahoma State University College of Education. Students must be working toward certification in a defined critical shortage teaching field. Incoming freshmen must have graduated from an Oklahoma high school, be in the top 15% of the class, and score at or above the 85th percentile on the ACT. Due date and number of awards may vary. more...

You must have a minimum GPA of 3.0, be active in community service, have no criminal conviction and demonstrate exemplary character to be eligible for this award. Financial need will be considered. more...

Kalais & Beck Rao Scholarship In Memory Of Dr. Gerald Kidd
Scholarship for full-time graduate students attending the University of Oklahoma enrolled in the Department of Education. Applicants must have a minimum 3.0 GPA, involvement in community service and demonstrate personal integrity. Special consideration is given to international students, in particular students from India. An essay must be included with application packet. more...

Scholarship for undergraduate students enrolled full-time at Ohio State University College of Food, Agricultural, and Environmental Sciences. Preference given to Wyandot County, Ohio residents with an interest in Agribusiness or Animal Science. Number of awards and award amount may vary. more...

Scholarship for undergraduate or graduate students attending the University of Oklahoma. Selection is based on academic performance and leadership. Due date may vary. more...

Scholarship for female, second or third year law students attending the University of Oklahoma majoring in Law. Selection is based on academic achievement, moral character, participation in activities of the College of Law and other evidence of potential success. Due date may vary. more...

Kappa Kappa Gamma Undergraduate Rehabilitation Scholarships
Scholarship for undergraduate students who attending the University of Oklahoma majoring in a related field of rehabilitation such as Physical or Occupational Therapy. Applicants must be members of Kappa Kappa Gamma or have completed two years of on a campus where there is a Kappa Chapter and be a U.S. or Canadian citizen. Number of awards may vary. more...

Oklahoma State University (Ceat)-Sae Engineering Scholarship
Annual award for graduating high school seniors planning to attend Oklahoma State University majoring in Mechanical, Electrical, or Industrial Engineering. Students must be U.S. citizens, have a minimum 3.8 GPA, a minimum 1350 SAT score or a minimum 30 ACT score. An essay must be included with application packet. Renewable. more...

Oklahoma State University Agricultural Education Scholarship, Inc. Scholarship
Scholarship for undergraduate students enrolled at Oklahoma State University pursuing studies in Agriculture. Students must have a minimum 2.75 GPA and have completed a minimum of twelve college credits. Consideration given to financial need. Number of awards may vary. Contact the college or the Foundation for more information and/or application. more...

Oklahoma State University Scholarship
Annual award for incoming freshmen at Oklahoma State University who will be enrolling in the College of Agriculture. Selection based on academic achievement and leadership abilities. Due date may vary. Contact the colleges financial aid department for more information and/or application. more...

Oklahoma Vegetable Association Scholarship
Annual award for undergraduate students enrolled full-time at Oklahoma State University College of Agricultural Sciences and Natural Resources Department of Horticulture and Landscape Architecture majoring in Vegetable Production. Consideration given to financial need. more...

Oklahoma Vegetation Management Association Scholarship
Scholarship for undergraduate (freshmen ineligible) or graduate students enrolled full-time at Oklahoma State University College of Agricultural Sciences and Natural Resources Department of Horticulture and Landscape Architecture majoring in Turfgrass Management. Students must have completed 15 credit hours in soil science, horticulture, forestry, urban forestry, physical science, or biological science. more...

Oklahoma Veterinary Education Supply (Oves) Scholarship
Annual award for graduate students enrolled full-time at Oklahoma State University College of Veterinary Medicine. Students must be first, second, or third year students, have a minimum 3.0 GPA, and financial need. more...

Olen D. & Clara Joyner Scholarship
Annual award for Mountain View or Gotebo, Oklahoma residents who are incoming freshmen enrolled at Oklahoma State University College of Agricultural Sciences and Natural Resources majoring in Animal Science, Animal Science/Agricultural Education Teaching, Agricultural Education/Teaching option, Agricultural Education/Agricultural Economics, or Agricultural Education/Horticulture. more...

Olin D. Branstetter Memorial Scholarship
Scholarship for undergraduate students enrolled full-time at Oklahoma State University School of Business. Students must have 50% of hours on the Stillwater campus and have a minimum 2.0 GPA. Number of awards and award amount may vary. Nonrenewable; recipients may reapply. more...

Olive Hawes Scholarship Fund
Scholarship for juniors and seniors attending the University of Oklahoma majoring in Modern Language or Linguistics. Applicants must have a minimum 3.5 overall GPA. Number of awards may vary. more...

Omer & Marge Pipkin-R.G. Askew Chemical Engineering Scholarship Fund
Scholarship for undergraduate students attending the University of Oklahoma majoring in Chemical Engineering. Applicants must have a minimum 3.0 CGPA, and show significant participation in extracurricular student activities. more...

Opal Theo Howell Scholarship
Scholarship for incoming freshmen who are graduates of Claremore High School enrolling at the University of Oklahoma. Applicants must have a minimum 3.5 GPA. more...

Opera Guild Award
Scholarship for undergraduate or graduate students attending the University of Oklahoma majoring in Music who are outstanding performers in Opera/Music Theatre programs. Applicants must have a minimum of one semester residence at OU as a Music major. Deadlines and award amounts may vary. more...

Opportunity Award Scholarships
Scholarship for undergraduate students enrolled full-time at Oklahoma City University. Incoming freshmen must have a minimum ACT score of 22 and a minimum 3.0 GPA and transfer students must have a minimum 2.50 GPA. Due date and number of awards may vary. An essay must be included with application packet. Renewable. more...

Scholarship for Oklahoma residents who are undergraduate (freshmen ineligible) students enrolled full-time at Oklahoma State University College of Education. Students must demonstrate academic achievement, leadership qualities, and financial need. Due date may vary. more...

Students must have a FFA background, exhibit a commitment to Agriculture and the family farm, demonstrate leadership, and academic achievement. more...

Patricia L. Eidson Scholarship In Interior Architecture
The Patricia L. Eidson Scholarship in Interior Architecture is open to undergraduate and graduate students who are pursuing a degree in the University of Oklahoma College of Architecture in a program accredited by FIDER. Graduate students in the College of Architecture who have an undergraduate degree from a program accredited by NAAB or FIDER and whose graduate work is focused on interior architecture are also eligible. Your selection for this award is based on your work portfolio, transcript and recommendations. A minimum 3.3 GPA in studio classes and a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 are also required. more...

Students must be pursuing a career with red meat interest, be members of the Meats Judging Team, and be intersted in a career in the meat industry. Award amount may vary. Scholarship for undergraduate students attending the University of Tulsa, who are interested in becoming members of the Cheer or Pom Squad. Selection is determined by demonstrated ability through tryouts held on the TU campus in spring. Award amount is $600 per semester for Cheer Squad members; $400 per semester for Pom Squad members. Uniforms and shoes, and travel expenses to games are provided by the university. Number of awards varies. Contact the Spirit Coordinator for more information and/or application. more...

Scholarship for graduate students attending the University of Oklahoma College of Pharmacy. Students must be P-2 or P-3 students with strong academic achievement in pharmacy and interest in community practice. Award amount may vary. more...

Walker Forestry Scholarship
Annual award for undergraduate students (seniors ineligible) enrolled full-time at Oklahoma State University College of Agricultural Sciences and Natural Resources Department of Forestry majoring in Forestry. more...

Walker Stone Memorial Scholarship
Annual award for undergraduate students enrolled full-time at Oklahoma State University College of Arts and Sciences majoring in News Editorial. Students must have a minimum 3.0 GPA and be pursuing a career in Newspaper. more...

Wallace Miller Memorial Scholarship
Annual award for western Oklahoma residents who are incoming college juniors or seniors enrolled full-time at Oklahoma State University College of Agricultural Sciences and Natural Resources Department of Plant and Soil Sciences majoring in Plant and Soil Sciences. Students must have an interest in land management and be active in FFA or 4-H. Due dates are February 1st for freshmen and January 15th for continuing/transfer students. more...

Walter F. Gnezda Memorial Scholarship
Annual award for undergraduate students enrolled full-time at Ohio State University-Mansfield. Students must be children of parents with multiple sclerosis. A FAFSA must be submitted. Due date and award amount may vary. more...

Walter F. Scheffer Scholarship
Scholarship for graduate students attending the University of Oklahoma enrolled in the Master of Public Administration program. Applicants must have completed a minimum 8 hours of OU graduate work and no more than 24 hours and have a minimum 3.5 GPA. Awards are based on merit. more...

Scholarship for undergraduate students enrolled full-time at Ohio State University College of Engineering. Due date and number of awards may vary. more...

Walter Hamiliton Scholarship
Scholarship for undergraduate students enrolled full-time at Oklahoma State University College of Arts and Sciences majoring in Chemistry. Students must demonstrate academic achievement. Due date is in the spring. more...

Scholarship for minority graduate students attending the University of Oklahoma enrolled in the Health Sciences Center. Awards are based on merit and need. more...

Scholarship for undergraduate students attending the University of Tulsa full-time, majoring in Law. Applicants must have an outstanding academic record and be in good standing with the university. Due date, number of awards and award amount varies. more...

Wayne E. Love Trust Scholarship
Scholarship for Kay County, Oklahoma residents who are undergraduate students attending the University of Oklahoma. Applicants must demonstrate academic merit, leadership, and financial need. Students must file the FAFSA. more...

Wayne Grovenburg Memorial Endowed Scholarship
Scholarship for undergraduate (freshmen ineligible) students enrolled full-time at Oklahoma State University School of Business majoring in Management Information Systems, Management Science, or Computer Systems. Students must have 50% of hours on the Stillwater campus and have a minimum 3.0 GPA. Number of awards and award amount may vary. Nonrenewable; recipients may reapply. more...

Scholarship for undergraduate students enrolled full-time at Seminole Community College. Students must have a minimum 2.0 GPA. Number of awards and award amount may vary. more...

Scholarship for third year law students attending the University of Oklahoma College of Law. Student must have the highest GPA in Evidence, Civil Procedure I and Civil Procedute II. Due date may vary. more...

Annual award for graduate students enrolled full-time at Oklahoma State University College of Veterinary Medicine. Students must be first, second, third, or fourth year students, demonstrate academic achievement, and special interest in parasitology. more...

Wendell Sharpton Family Scholarship
Annual award for undergraduate or graduate students enrolled full-time at Oklahoma State University College of Education majoring in Elementary or Secondary Education. Students must be preparing to enter public school teaching or have a minimum of one year teaching experience. Applicants who are graduate students must be Oklahoma residents in either elementary or secondary education, have a minimum 3.25 CGPA, and demonstrate finanical need. Preference given to graduates of Charles Page High School in Sand Springs, Oklahoma. Due date may vary. more...
